channel.title: HELP- Changing xp amounts
channel.description:
[glow=green,2,300]how can i change the xp amounts given from hitting a door in testscape.. the only tut i found was for cheezscape i think , and i cant seem to do it[/glow]
plz help ty =)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:43:30 PM[/size][hr]also.. atleast for my comp , the development /help thread is down :(
